page.title: 11CLUBS & ORGANISATIONS-CONT
page.content: {SCOUTS Scouts meet every Wednesday in the Community centre at 7.00 pm. There are lots of different awards to work for these include Standards and intrest badges.When we arrive we have flagbreak and inspection which is very strict.If it is sunny we go up on the hill to play games.At the end we say a prayer and take the flag down. ___________ As well as the uniformed organisations there are several other clubs in the area,Judo meets three nights a week Scottish Country Dancing for adults and children is on Thursday and on Monday the Margaret Rose School meet in the Burgh Hall..We learn ballet,tap modern stage and majorettes We often perform at Galas and this year we are going to Thouars in France to dance. Many church groups meet in the hall.
